channel.title: Wan't to change sprites Source Sided
channel.description: Hey i use webclients and wan't to change the sprites of some stuff like crowns... How can I do this and if i did this source sided would everyone have the same sprites as me? Due to them downloading the cache?

item.title: Wan't to change sprites Source Sided
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

distribute a new cache/client = bam your ready.

Read full topic
item.source: Wan't to change sprites Source Sided

item.title: Wan't to change sprites Source Sided
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

You need a update server (won’t go into much detail) and what it does is sends the cache to the client e.g. the cache would be located within the server itself so any changes you make to the cache would also be updated for users.

If you look through some 317’s I’m sure they have it which you can rip out if you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Wan't to change sprites Source Sided
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vain_:

the only way to edit the sprites is to edit the client.

*Unless you do some serious modifications and make the cache loaded server sided, and the client connect to that, bla bla bla. Yeah. I don’t think you can at your skill level, I know I can’t unless I had a copy/paste tutorial lol.

tgm clan:

^ Will other players see it if they play the webclient?

Yes, if you update the cache, and then have the client download the latest version.

Read full topic
